title: My phone(pixel 3) has switched off and not switching on again even after charging for several hours.
content:
Initially my phone showed 1% battery and after that i tried charging my phone for an hour. But still it was showing 1%. I then tried restarting my phone. The moment i selected the option restart, the phone got switched off and not switching on even after charging for several hours. Kindly help me, as my phone is also in warranty. I hope it has 2 yrs warranty. so kindly help me to claim it.

Thank you.
